; ; koVduku moVdda rasaM kosaM … kappalA weVricinA nI notlo nA moVddA … nI yammA… moVgudu caccinA… nI pUkulo wIta waggalexe… kanna koVduku wote… raMjugA xeVMgiMcu kuMtunnAve… bajAru laMjA … aMtU paccigA widuwU … wana cewiwo moVddanu pattukoVni muMxuku veVnakki koVttukuMtunnAdu… avunurA nenu koVdukuwo xeVMgiccu koVne bajAru laMjanerA … nA koVduku moVddaMte… iRtaM aMxuke vAdi xaggara paMgacAcAnu … abbA … kArcarA … laMjA kodAka… nI moVdda rasAla kosaM… nI kanna walli kAcukoVni kUrcuMte … kArcarA nIyammA … laMjA koVdakA… aMtU oVka cewwo wana saMdlu pisukkuMtU… iMko cewini wana pUku pEna ruxxukoVni… cewiki aMtina wana pUku rasAlanu nAkuwuMxi… suniwA… abbA … ammA … eVM ceswunnAve … hhaha … umm … nIyammani xeVMgA … A .

opakka brahmaMdamweVna agAXaM , maropakka eVwwugA koVMdalu ! maXyamaXyalo cinnicinni UlYlYu A UlYlYallo ceVkkalawo kattina cinna cinna boVmmarillulAMti ilYlYu ! cUddAniki eVMwo aMxaMgA muccatagA vunnAy , A ilYlYallo nuMci weVllagA cinna cinna kalYlYawo vunna swrIlu pillalu mArweVlu vepu cUswU cewulUpuwunnAru .

( nAku weVlisiMxi ) … manamoVccesariki aMwA bAne uMtuMxi .. nA prAseVs kUdA ayipoyi uMtuMxi…peVxxagA pani uMdaxule anukuMtU lIvayyaka veVlYlYi cUswe .. emuMtuMxi… eVdArilo uMde vAlYlYaki oVyAsis kanipiMcinatlu…nenu vaccesariki mA tIM metla moVhAlannI xexIpyamAnaM gA veVligipowunnAyi…nA kudi kannu axaradaM moVxalayyiMxi…ixeMti svAmi I SakunaM ani anukuMtU unnA .. I SakunAlannI xIniki nAMxi ani nAku appudarXaM kAlexu… mA lId kAn vI mIt ani adigAdu… mItiMg lo sUtigA suwwi lekuMdA mIru ceswunna prAseVs rikvErmeVMts mArAyi…iMkA axi deVvalapmeVMt stej lone uMxi…AnsEt vAlYlYu axi eVppudu iswArani aduguwunnAru…sityuyeRan koVMceVM kritikalgA uMxi .. mIru tek ovar cesukuMte bAguMtuMxi ani ceVppesAdu… migawA vAlYlYu heVlp ceswAru mIku .. vAlYlYu iRyU PiksiMg lo bijI gA unnAru ani apdets iswunnAdu… ahA ixA saMgawi .. aMxukenA inni vacci rAvadaMwone inni SuBa SakunAlu kanipiMcAyi ani anukunnA… oVppukunna peVlYlYiki vAyiMcaka wappuwuMxA ani malYlYI moVxaleVttA…axeVppudu kaMplIt avuwuMxA ani mA teVstiMg tIM vAlYlYu veVyitiMg…AnsEt vAlYlYU veVyitiMg…nI prAseVs kosaM eVMwa maMxi veVyitiMg cUdu .. suduMxammAyi nIku ani mA tIM mets jokAru… ippudI kulYlYu jokulu avasaramA ani wIkRaNaMgA o lukku ivvadaMwo veVnakki waggAru… sare moVwwAniki kodiMg ni o koVlikki weVccAka teVst ceswe AhA nA sAmiraMgA exceptions mIxa exceptions …xAniki wodu mA teVstiMg tIM vAlYlYu ayyipoyiMxA mI pani…ika memu moVxaleVttaccA ani oVka gola…AlreVdi sagaM meVMtaleVkkina stejlo uMte vIlYlYaxoVkati…ApaMdeVheV mI gola muMxu nannu sWimiwaMgA teVst ceyanivvaMdi aMwavaraku nA xarixApulloki rAvaxxu ani sIriyas gA vArniMg iccA .. .

SAMwi praboXa ( biyAs mqwula smAraka kaviwa july 2014 ) nalla nAgulA niganigalAde nIvu kotlAxi rUpAyalu miMgeswU meVwwagA suwimeVwwagA maMxraMgA sAge saMgIwaMlA jAripowU koVMdAkonala hqxaya waMwrulni mItuwU paccApaccani paMtacela naduma viMwasoyagAloVlikiswU grAmAlanu nagarAlanu anusaMXAnaM ceswU UlYlYU elYlU seVlayelYlYu xAteswAvu samuxrapu aMculniwAki anirvacanIya AnaMxaM poVMxuwU naxIjalAla sarigamalawo maMcumuxxavuwAvu pakRula kilakilArAvAlawo mEmaraci powU raMgu raMgula sIwakokacilukala sOMxaryaMwo paravaSiswAvu xurBeXyamEna araNyAlni cIlcukuMtU adavipUla parimalYAlu AGrANiswU krUra mqgAlanU , viRasarpAlanu hawwukuMtU vanya prANulawo nI goVMwu jawa kalupuwAvu veVxuru poVxalawo UsuladuwU mabbuwunakalawo sayyAtalAduwU eVMdA vAnA , cali gilI jAnwA nE aMtAvu skElArk lA gAli pAtalu pAduwU paMtapoVlAlU , baMjaruBUmulU , eVdArulU paccika bayalYlYU , ciwwadi nelalU xennEnA vaSaM cesesukuMtAvu prakqwi viMwalni , viSvaMloni viddUrAlni kalYlYappagiMci cUswU pasidi kAMwulni , XavalYa reKalni spqSiswU brahmarAwa mArceswAmane bahulYa jAwi kaMpeVnIla xvaMxa rIwinI sWAnika praBuwvAla kutralu , kuwaMwrAlU BAraMgA moswU aBivqxXi reVkkalu mosukoVcce pariNAmAlu BariswU jaruguwunna viXvaMsAniki sAkRigA niluswAvu ASala pallakilo UreguwU kanipiMcani valalo cikkukune aBAgyulanU virigina reVkkala mAtuna xAgipoye pexavAri AkalixappulanU GanIBaviMcina eVnneVnno cexu Gatanalni nI carmapu poVralakiMxa xAceswU agAXaMloki xUke jalapAwaMlA urakalu veswU agupiswAvu AwmIyawAnubaMXAla saMbaMXa baMXyavyAlu kalupuwU alupu soVlupu lekuMdA yojanAla koVxxI saMcAraMceswU saMskqwi , nAgarikawalanu viSvavyApwaM ceswAvu recukukkalu warumukoVswunnatlu xOduwIswUno niMdu garBiNilA kaxalaleka kaxuluwUno gamyaMkesi gamanaM sAgiswU xUrAla wIrAlu xAteswuMtAvu nIku aMwarAla aMwaraMgAla goVdavelexu jAwi , mawa kula BexAle levu raMgu rUpu , BARa yAsalawo panilexu eVMwa viSAla hqxayaM nIxi ?

TRIBALS/08.pdf 1985 July - Karamchedu NTR ki manchi peru thesthy ... 1991 Janaradhan reddy ... Karamchedu Incident : prakARaM jilla xarsi maMdalaM loni oVka grAmaM kAraMcedu , , cirAlaku 7 ki mi xUraM , 16 vArdulu gala kAraMcedu grAmaMloVni 6 vArdulalo nivAsamuMtunna xalYiwulalo aXika saMKyAkulugA unna mAxigalu .

koVMwamaMxi paniwIru naccuwuMxi , vAri veRa BARalu kUdA manaku eVMwo naccuwAyi ! itlA mIku naccina viRayAlanu , prawyekiMci mIru cese uxyogaM lo , mI iwara koVlIgs wo kAnI , lexA mI kriMxa pani cese vAriwo kAnI , weVliya ceyadaM , mI mAnava saMbaMXAlanu vqxXi ceswuMxi ! vAri battalu bAguMte ” mI cIra nAku nacciMxi ano lexA ” mI salvAr kamIj nAku nacciMxi ” ano , lexA mI tI Rart cAlA bAvuMxi ano mIru vArini praSaMsiMca vaccu ! atlAge ” mI heVyir stEl nAku nacciMxi koVwwa gA uMxi ! ani kAnI , mI byAMgils bAvunnAyi ani kAnI mIru swrI lanu praSaMsiMca vaccu ! atlAge puruRulanu kUdA mI Rartu bAvuMxani kAnI mI vAc nAku nacciMxi ani kAnI mI heVyir stEl koVwwa gA uMxi ani kAnI praSaMsiMca vaccu ! axe viXaM gA cese uxyogaM guriMci kUdA ” A kastamar wo nuvvu dIl cesina viXAnaM nAku nacciMxi ! ano lexA ” A mItiMg lo mIru ceVppina pAyiMts nAku naccAyi ” ani kAnI , ” mI preVjeVMteRan cAlA bAguMxi ”ani kAnI mI aBinaMxana lanu weVliya ceya vaccu ! mI praSaMsalu sahajaM gA , hqxaya pUrvakaM gA uMdAli ! itlA mIru iwara uxyogulanu praSaMsiswe , mAnava sahajamEna kqwajFawA BAvaM vArilo mI mIxa vAriki erpaduwuMxi . 
BOwikaSarIra nirmANa xqRtyA , puruRudu ceyagala panulanniMtinI swrI ceyalekapowunnaxi . 
plAstik‌ rahiwa BaviRyawwunu rAnunna warAlaku aMxiMcAli . 
ayiwe migilina aSvin bAbu , vinox laku kUdA maMci prAXAnyaM uMtuMxi .

billulu ceVlliMcaMdi ' pawwi koVnugolu keMxrAlu prAraMBiMcaMdi grAmINABivqxXiki kqRi ' prawAp‌reVddi ASaya sAXanaku kqRi ' upAXi niXulu ... uP mqwaxehAlanu saMxarSiMcina jUlakaMti , ceVrupalli puRkarAlaku muMxaswu erpAtlu girijana xIkRa postar‌ AviRkaraNa jillA sWAyi kabaddI potIlu miRan‌ iMxraXanussu sarve pUrwi hotal‌ yajamAnulu SuBrawa pAtiMcAli upAXi sibbaMxipE dvAmA pIdi AgrahaM peVruguwunnacali 100 maMxiki newra parIkRalu rasABAsagA maMdalapariRaw‌ sarvasaBya samAveSaM kRawagAwrulaku meVrugEna vExya sevalu rEwurakRaNa pAxayAwra karapawraM viduxala ' bisi sab‌plAn‌ cattaM ceyaMdi ' rEwulanu AxukovAli : jUlakaMti ' aByAs‌ ' lo aMwarjAwIya nANela praxarSana paMdlaku viRa pUwa‌ prAraMBaMwone sari .. koVnugolu levu mari raMgAreVddi smAraka Bavana SaMkusWApana karapawrAlu viduxala eVdama kAlvaku aXika nItini viduxala ceyAli kRawa gAwrulaku meVrugEna vExya sevalu samasyala valayaMlo ... girijana gurukula bAlikala pATaSAla pawwi koVnugolu keMxraM prAraMBaM niMxiwula prAraMBiMci xivya paripAlana moVxalu peVttAli , mamulanu eVMwa arXaM cesukoVMte aMwa xivya rAjyaM lexA melEna prajAsvAmyaM avuwuMxi ani grahiMcaMdi , kanIsaM mAta kAlame niyamiMpa badatame ippudu mA prawyekawa , vIravAsaraM lo mA amma amma gArini , aXikArikaMgA nyAya sWAnaM vAru , jAwiki mAwq mUrwigA gurwiMcadaM valana manuRyulalo ahaMkAramulu , Xana vyAmohAlu waggi , maniRini gOraviswene XanaM No ravished country ever borne witness to the prowess of the followers of the Buddha ; no murdered men have poured out their blood on their hearth stones , killed in his name : no ruined women have cursed his name to high heaven .

sargamu – sarva prapaMca sqRtini viswariMcexi prawi sargamu – sakala prapaMcamu layamayye lakRaNaM weVlipexi ( pralYayaM ) vaMSamu – pqWu , priya vrawAxula vaMSowpawwini vivariMcuta manvaMwaramu – e kalpaMlo e manuvu kAlaMlo emi jarigiMxo weVluputa vaMSAlacariwra BAgavawaMlo purANa lakRaNAlu paxi ceVppabaddAyi sargopyaSca visargaSca vqwwi rakRAMwarANi ca vaMSo vaMSAnucariwaM saMsWAhewu rapASraya xaSaBirlakRaNEryukwaM purANaM waxvixo vixu : anagA sargamu ( sqRti ) , prawisargamu ( pralYayamu ) , vqwwi ( vyApAramu ) , rakRA ( paripAlava ) , aMwaramu ( manvAxula kAlamu ) , vaMSamu ( vaMSAxula viRayamu ) , vaMSAnucariwamu ( sUrya , caMxra vaMSasWula kaXanAlu ) , saMsWA ( sWiwi ) , hewuvu ( kAraNamu ) , apASrayamu ( ASraya viRayAlu ) ane paxI purANa lakRaNAlu .

brahma murAri surArciwa liMgaMbrahma , viRNu , xevawala cewa pUjiMpabadda liMgaM .. ! ! nirmala BARiwa SoBiwa liMgaM , nirmalamEna mAtala cewa alaMkariMpabadda liMgaM .. ! ! janmaja xuHKa vinASaka liMgaM , janma valla puttina bAXalanu nASanaM cese liMgaM .. ! ! waw praNamAmi saxA Siva liMgaM , o saxA Siva liMgaM nIku namaskAraM .. ! ! xevamuni pravarArciwa liMgaMxevamunulu , mahA qRulu pUjiMpa liMgaM .. ! ! kAmaxahana karuNAkara liMgaM , manmaXudini xahanaM cesina , apAramEna karuNanu cUpe cewulu gala SivaliMgaM .. ! ! rAvaNa xarpa vinASaka liMgaM , rAvaNudi garvAnni nASanaM cesinatti Siva liMgaM .. ! ! waw praNamAmi saxa Siva liMgaM , nIku ive nA namaskArAlu , o saxA Siva liMgamA .. ! ! sarva sugaMXa sulepiwa liMgaM , anni maMci gaMXAlu , maMci gA pUsina Siva liMgaM .. ! ! buxXi vivarXana kAraNa liMgaM , manuRula buxXi vikAsAniki kAraNa mEna Siva liMgaM .. ! ! sixXa surAsura vaMxiwa liMgaM , sixXulu , xevawalu , rAkRasula cewa kIrwiMpabadda Siva liMgaM .. ! ! waw praNamAmi saxA Siva liMgaM , nIku ive nA namaskArAlu , o saxA Siva liMgamA .. ! ! kanaka mahAmaNi BURiwa liMgaM , baMgAru , mahA maNula cewa alaMkariMpa badda Siva liMgaM .. ! ! PaNipawi veRtiwa SoBiwa liMgaM , nAgarAju nivAsaM cewa alaMkariMpabadda Siva liMgaM .. ! ! xakRa suyajFa vinASaka liMgaM , xakRudu cesina maMci yajFAnni nASanaM cesina Siva liMgaM .. ! ! waw praNamAmi saxA Siva liMgaM , nIku ive nA namaskArAlu , o saxA Siva liMgamA .. ! ! kuMkuma caMxana lepiwa liMgaM , kuMkuma , gaMXamu pUyabadda Siva liMgaM .. ! ! paMkaja hAra suSoBiwa liMgaM , kaluvala xaMda cewa cakkagA alaMkariMpa badda Siva liMgaM .. ! ! saMciwa pApa vinASaka liMgaM , saMkramiMcina pApAlani nASanaM cese Siva liMgaM .. ! ! waw praNamAmi saxA Siva liMgaM , nIku ive nA namaskArAlu , o saxA Siva liMgamA .. ! ! xevagaNArciwa seviwa liMgaM , xeva gaNAla cewa pUjiMpa badda , seviMca badda Siva liMgaM .. ! ! BAvEr BakwI Birevaca liMgaM , cakkati BAvaM wo kUdina BakwI cewa pUjiMpa badda Siva liMgaM .. ! ! xinakara koti praBAkara liMgaM , koti sUryula kAMwiwo veVlige maro sUrya biMbaM lAMti Siva liMgaM .. ! ! waw praNamAmi saxA Siva liMgaM , nIku ive nA namaskArAlu , o saxA Siva liMgamA .. ! ! aRta xalopari veRtiwa liMgaM , eVnimixi rakAla Akula mIxa nivAsamuMde Siva liMgaM .. ! ! sarva samuxBava kAraNa liMgaM , annI samAnaMgA janmiMcadAniki kAraNamEna Siva liMgaM .. ! ! aRta xarixra vinASaka liMgaM , eVnimixi rakAla xarixrAlanu ( aRta xarixrAlu ) nASanaM cese Siva liMgaM .. ! ! waw praNamAmi saxA Siva liMgaM , nIku ive nA namaskArAlu , o saxA Siva liMgamA .. ! ! suraguru suravara pUjiwa liMgaM , xeva guruvu ( bqhaspawi ) , xevawala cewa pUjiMpa badda Siva liMgaM .. ! ! suravana puRpa saxArciwa liMgaM , xevawala wotallo pUce puvvulu ( pArijAwAlu ) cewa eVppudU pUjiMpa bade Siva liMgaM .. ! ! paramapaxaM paramAwmaka liMgaM , o Siva liMgamA , nI sanniXi e oVka svargamuwaw praNamAmi saxA Siva liMgaMnIku ive nA namaskArAlu , o saxA Siva liMgamA .. ! ! liMgARtaka mixaM puNyaM yaH pattew Siva sanniXO , eVppudEwe Sivudi sanniXilo caxavabaduwuMxo , vAriki cAlA puNyaM vaswuMxi .. ! ! SrIXarma - puranivAsa xuRtasaMhAra ! narasiMha - xuriwaxUra ... 31 XaraNilo veyeMdlu - wanuvu nilvagaboxu Xana meVppatiki SASva - waMbu gAxu xArasuwAxulu - wanaveVMta rAleru Bruwyulu mqwini xa - ppiMpaleru baMXujAlamu wannu - brawikiMcukoleru balaparAkrama memi - paniki rAxu GanamEna sakala BA - gyaM beVMwa galgina gocimAwraMbEna - goVnucubodu veVrYrYi kukkala Bramalanni - vidici ninnu Bajana jeseVdivAriki - baramasuKamu .

naMxA , grIku , mOrya , RuMgA , iMdo -JOIN grIku , yAvuXeya , mOKarI , rAjapuwrulu -JOIN paMxIrulu , caMdeVlA , mukwApixA , AyuxXA , gurjara -JOIN prawihAra , pAlYulu waxiwarulu ) I prAMwaMlo wama vArasawvAnni vidicipeVttAru , I prAMwaMlo vAri vArasula moVxati mariyu civari perlu vAri cAriwraka mUlAlanu prawibiMbiswAyi ( mariyu koVnnisArlu purANa mUlAlu kUdA weVliyajeswAyi , uxAharaNaku , sUryavaMSaM / caMxravaMSaM ) .

bAlyaM [ mArcu ] 1958 , epril 18 na bArbadas loni bridjitOn lo mAlkaM mArRal janmiMcAdu . 
vilan‌ wammudni caMpadAniki hIroyin‌ni eVMxuku addu peVttukovAlo arWaM kAxu .

SrInivAsa -- kumArA ! atuane kAnimmu , poyirammu ! ( brahma veVlYlipowAdu ) SrInivAsa - I veMkatAcalamunu vaxili agaswyASramamunaku , maralutaku manasoVppakunnaxi . 
AmeV kattukunna cIra eVmEpoVinxoV weVlIxu .. AmeV anumawi lekuMdAne veVdalpu ayipowunna AmeV woVdala maXya nuMdi veVccani Avirlu kakkuwunna AmeV AdawanaM loniki exo jorabaduwunnattu AmeV grahiMce lope vAdi vAdi ayina koVlimilA kAluwunna AyuXAnni kassuna AmeV pUvuloniki xiMpesi AmeVnu kulYlaboVdiceVswu AmeV peVxavulu aMxukodAniki prayawniswunnAdu .. eVMwa cUsinA vAdeVvaro weVliyadaMlexu” oVkesAri kalYlYu weVrici cUsiMxi pUja .. svimmiMg pUl baxulu AmeV padukunna maMcaM mIxe vuMxi .. pakkana eVvaru leru .. valYlYaMwA ceVmatawo niMdi vuMxi .. “ohh .. kalA” anukuni appatike A kala praBAvaMwo ciwwadigA mAri rAsAlUruwunna AmeV AdawanAnni nEtI wone addukuni eMti ilAMti kala vacciMxi anukuMtU malYlI padukuMxi . 
rAjyAMga musAyixA rUpa‌ka‌lpa‌na‌ saMGaM aXyakRudugA dAkta‌r bAbA sAheVb aMbexka‌r cesina‌ kqRiki pra‌NAmAlu arpiswunnAnu” ani pra‌XAna maMwri perkoVnnAru .

xIrGavqwwaM .. ( koVwwa silabas ) 
U. S. praBuwvaM I stUdiyonu SikRaNa mariyu pracAra ciwrAlanu rUpoVMxiMcadAniki niyamiMci , disnIki avasaramEna niXulanu samakUrciMxi . 
iBAT wAwparyamu ... karaNI = Ada yenugula ; kara = woVMdamula cewa ; uw + jiwa = cimma badina ; kaM = nIti ; kaNa = biMxuvula ; Catan = XAra laMxu ; wogi = wadasi poyi ; seVlayeti = seVlayelYlYa wo kUdina ; nIlAxri = nIlagiri ; ceVluvun = valeV ; weVgadun = parihasiMcunu ; haswinI = Adu enugula ; haswa = woVMdamula cewa ; vinyaswa = uMcabadina ; paxmaMbulan = paxmamulawo ; veyigannula vAni = iMxruni { veyi kannula vAdu – veVyyi kannulu gala vAdu , sahasrAkRudu , iMxrudu } ; veVrYavu = awiSayamunu ; cUpun = cUpiMcunu ; kalaBa = gunna yenugulace ; sama = aXikamuga ; uwkIrNa = jallabadina ; kalhAra rajamunan = paxmamula puppoVdiwo ; kanakA caleMxraMbu = meru parvawamu yoVkka { kanakA caleMxramu - kanaka ( baMgAru ) Acala ( koVMdalalo ) iMxramu ( goVppaxi ) , meru parvawamu } ; Ganawan = goVppa xanamunu ; wAlcun = XariMcunu ; kuMjarI = Ada yenugulace ; pariciwa = samarpiMcabadina ; kumuxa = kaluvala ; kAMdaMbulan = wUlYlYawo ; PaNi rAja maMdana = parama Sivuni { PaNi rAja maMdanudu - PaNi ( sarpamulalo ) rAja ( SreRTamulace ) maMdana ( alaMkariMpabadina vAdu ) , Sivudu } ; praBan = prakASamunu ; vahiMcun = XariMcunu . 
aMxuke IsAri mIdiyA sAkRigA nayanawArapE hansika seVtErlu veyadame kAkuMdA nayanawAraku bahiraMgaMgA o savAl nu kUdA visiriMxi . 
svIdan jAwIya gurwiMpu kArdulanu jArI ceswuMxi , kAnI oVka svIdiR pOruniki pAs‌port lekuMdA skeVMjeVn eriyA bayataku veVlYlYatAniki anumawiMcaxu . 
vivarAlu : stAP seVlakRan kamiRan keMxra praBuwvaMloni palu dipArt‌meVMtlalo KAlYIlanu BarwI ceswuMxi . 
I viRayAnni xqRtilo peVttukoVni EAr‌dIe peVxxavAlYla Arogya bImA viRayaMlo koVnni kIlaka saMskaraNalu cesiMxi . 
atu bApirAjunu , itu praBAkar‌nu kUdA SAMwiMpaceseMxuku wanavaMwugA prayawnAlu cesinA avi PaliMcalexu . 
weVlaMgANa rARtraM erpAtEna warvAwa moVttamoVxatisArigA jarige I jAwaranu vijayavaMwaM ceseMxukugAnu ArtIsI anni caryalu cepattiMxi . 
alA xarSiMcagaliginappudu mana premAspaxula rUpaMlo jIvulaku aMwaryAmi vrAsina premaleKa gocariswuMxi .

mohanarAgaM AlapiMcana SivAreVddi ” nAkiMxa pakkalAgo / nAvakiMxa nIlYlYalAgo / kalYlYakIMxa nIdalAgo / AkASaMkiMxa pakRi lAgo / Aku saMxullo narwiMce kiraNapuMjaMlAgo / eVMdAkAla gAli nuMdi pEki lecinappudu nuvvukanabadawAvu / vIXilo eVrrati sUryudu rAyi neVwwimIxa paddappudu nuvvu vinabadawAvu ”… .. aMtU wanakaviwalo / ” cexEnA vepaceVttu ciguriMcina vasaMwa kAlaMlA nuvvu axBuwaMgA saMgIwiMcina nicceVnala veVxuru vanaMlA nuvvu ” aMwakumuMxu kaviwalalo nippulu kuripiMcina SivAreVddi lAliwyamEna paxAlanu mohanA ! mohanA ! aMtU koVwwa koNaM AviRkariMcAru .

[ 4 ] varNana [ mArcu ] jIn PorAstI yoVkka moVttamoVxati raMgAla vargIkaraNa prakAraM , oVka ArWika vyavasWalo , vyavasAyowpawwula yoVkka oVka " prAWamika raMgaM " ( vyavasAyaM , paSuvula peVMpakaM , Kanija vanarula viniyogaM ) , uwpawwi mariyu prAseVsiMg‌la " xviwIya raMgaM " , mariyu sevAraMgAniki ceVMxina oVka " wqwIya raMgaM " uMtAyi . 
ixi pAriSrAmika keMxraMgA uMdadame iMwati viBinnawaku kAraNaM . 
48lakRalu koVnasAguwunna ' ammA -JOIN nAnna caxuvu ' kAryakramaM cewuleVwwesina kAMgreVs‌ koVnasAguwunna ' A ( nirA ) SA ' sammeV kUragAyala ammakAllo ' xalYArI ' kirikiri pyAsiMjar‌ke parimiwamEna kAjIpeta tOn‌ steRan‌ ArWika sAyaM kosaM eVxuru cUpulu 15 rojullo kevalaM 70 xaraKAswule .. ! ASayaM kosaM ASAlu tiAr‌eVs‌xe vijayaM rAyiwIlapE unna SraxXa kArmikulapE lexu soniyA gAMXI janmaxinaM ASAla samasyalanu pariRkariMcAli bAlala hakkula parirakRaNaku kqRi ceyAli mummaraMgA trAns‌ko panulu iMtipannula peVMpunu upasaMhariMcukovAli ijieVs‌ panulapE prajAvexika mUduceVkkalapalli ...
